awd_titl_txt: Collaborative Research:  Petrology, Geochemistry, and Age ofAccreted Oceanic Crust in the Northern California Coast     Ranges
awd_abstract_narration: The principal investigator, in collaboration with David Kimbrough               and Barry Hanan at San Diego State University, will continue his                study of the northern Coast Range ophiolite in California.  Field               relations, uranium-lead and argon-argon dating techniques,                      petrology, and geochemistry will be used in the Elder Creek area                to constrain the origin and time of intrusion of several                        different magma series, the relationships between each magma                    series and between plutonic and extrusive suites, and the                       tectonic history of this ophiolite in relation to other adjacent                units.  The same techniques will be employed in the Stonyford                   area to understand its age, origin, and tectonic history.  The                  research will shed new light on the geologic history of this                    complex plate boundary.

inst.inst_name: University of South Carolina at Columbia
